alert.note: Alert for Redwood; Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 11:14AM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Cottonwood River Above Springfield affecting Brown County. Cottonwood River at New Ulm affecting Brown County. Minnesota River At Morton affecting Redwood and Renville Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... South Fork Crow River below Mayer affecting Carver County. .River rises from melting snow will result in minor flooding. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River At Morton. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Riverside Rd and Front Street flooded in North Redwood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1000 AM CDT Sunday, the stage was 15.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Tuesday morning and continue rising to a crest of 22.8 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 22.8 feet on 08/13/2016. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
